text: Kang Sung-hee (; born 7 September 1972) is a South Korean politician and labour activist. He was the floor leader of the Progressive Party from 2023 to 2024. He is a member of the 21st National Assembly representing the Jeonju B constituency since 2023. Kang was an unsuccessful candidate for President of South Korea in the 2025 snap presidential election. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean activists Category:Politicians from Seoul
title: Kang Sung-hee (politician)
